# MarketplaceV3Offers.cancelOffer() method

Cancel an offer

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the offer you want to cancel
const offerId = "0";

await contract.offers.cancelOffer(offerId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
cancelOffer(offerId: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description  |
| --------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| offerId   | BigNumberish | the offer id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

the transaction receipt

## Remarks

Cancel an offer on the marketplace
